mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student( std_id, std_name, std_sex, std_tel, enter_time, is_party, class_id ) VALUES ( #{stdId}, #{stdName}, #{stdSex}, #{stdTel}, #{enterTime}, #{isParty}, #{classId} )
mapper.select: select std_id as stdId, std_name as stdName, std_sex as stdSex, std_tel as stdTel, enter_time as enterTime, is_party as isParty, class_id as classId from student where std_id=#{stdId}
select std_name as stdName from student where std_id=#{stdId}
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET std_id = #{student.stdId}, std_name = #{student.stdName}, std_sex = #{student.stdSex}, std_tel = #{student.stdTel}, enter_time = #{student.enterTime}, is_party = #{student.isParty}, class_id = #{student.classId} where std_id = #{student.stdId}
